replies.author: 博中
replies.txt_content:
标题: 注大家机年快乐！！这没什么。只是祝大家快乐。
顺便发一下指令（装,逼)
 /setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace 

{Text1:"{"text":"警告请勿右键

","color":"dark_red","clickEvent":

{"action":"run_command","value":"/setblock ~ ~1 ~ 

minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/setblock ~ ~1 ~ 

minecraft:air}"}}",Text2:"{"text":"","clickEvent":

{"action":"run_command","value":"/setblock ~ ~3 ~ 

minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/setblock ~ ~-1 ~ 

minecraft:redstone_block}

"}}",Text3:"{"text":"","clickEvent":

{"action":"run_command","value":"/setblock ~1 ~2 ~ 

minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/kill @a}

"}}",Text4:"{"text":"","clickEvent":

{"action":"run_command","value":"/setblock ~ ~2 ~ 

minecraft:redstone_block"}}"}复制代码
